description:
Robert has got those black curly locks that remind me of statues found in Rome.
Statuesque would be a great adjective for Robert. The boy is tall! At least 6'3 or 4. He does compete in the 0-60-n-60 contest (airing tomorrow), and I was alarmed out how small I was compared to him. I looked like a hobbit pornographer!
Robert has a serious girlfriend, and a relaxed attitude about sex. I'm gonna try to talk him in to coming back and getting a blow job (or more?)
So if you like this fresh-faced kid, you should be seeing him more on the site.
title: Robert - Solo
